column1: The INK4a - ARF locus, located on chromosome 9p21, encodes two cell - cycle regulatory proteins, p16 ( INK4a) and p14 ( ARF), acting through the Rb - CDK4 and p53 pathways.

The mechanism by which Akt regulates MMP - 9 is through the activation of NF - kappaB, as shown by coimmunoprecipitation of the phosphorylated form of IKKalpha and Akt as well as the SH - 5 suppression of the dissociation of IkappaB from NF - kappaB and the activation of NF - kappaB p65.

HS and 4CP also induced an increase in Noxa and Puma mRNAs, transcripts of two known proapoptotic p53 target genes; however, these two teratogens did not induce significant increases in NOXA and PUMA proteins, suggesting that p53 does not activate the mitochondrial apoptotic pathway by transcriptionally upregulating the expression of NOXA and PUMA proteins.

MSK1, and its related isoform MSK2, phosphorylate the transcription factors CREB ( cAMP - response - element - binding protein) and ATF1 ( activating transcription factor 1), and the chromatin proteins histone H3 and HMGN1 ( high - mobility - group nucleosomal - binding protein 1) in response to either mitogenic stimulation or cellular stress.

column1: Here we show that Rtt109 forms a complex with Vps75 and that both recombinant Rtt109 - Vps75 complexes and native complexes purified from yeast cells acetylate H3 present in H3 / H4 / H2A / H2B core histones but not other histones.
